snippet: Video posted online by Syrian opposition activists appeared to show airstrikes near the historic medieval castle Krak des Chevaliers, west of Homs.
abstract: Video posted online by Syrian opposition activists appeared to show airstrikes near the historic medieval castle Krak des Chevaliers, west of Homs.
